name: http://terremoti.ingv.it/ws/geoserver
description: GeoServer-based data catalog providing access to earthquake and geophysical data from the Istituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia (INGV). The catalog allows querying and accessing various layers and datasets related to seismic events and related geospatial information.
owner_name: Istituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia (INGV)
